by Time: $trip_name$"},"viz_chart_4":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.text":"Elevation (ft)","axisTitleY.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.abbreviation":"none","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.abbreviation":"none","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.abbreviation":"none","axisY2.enabled":0,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"connect","chart.showDataLabels":"none","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"none","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisMiddle","legend.mode":"standard","legend.placement":"none","lineWidth":2,"refresh.display":"progressbar","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_13"},"title":"Elevation by Time: $trip_name$"}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker |dedup trip |table trip","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker length |eval length=length/1609.34 | stats sum(length)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker length | eval duration = duration/1000/60/60 | stats sum(duration)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker s>0 |eval s=s*2.23694 |stats avg(s)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker s>0 |eval s=s*2.23694 |stats max(s)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker |eval s=s*2.23694, ele=ele*3.28084, trip_formatted=strftime(_time, \"%m-%2d-%Y\") |stats max(s) as TopSpeed, avg(s) as AvgSpeed, max(ele) as \"Max Elevation\" by trip_formatted | eval TopSpeed=if(TopSpeed=0,null(),TopSpeed), AvgSpeed=if(AvgSpeed=0,null(),AvgSpeed) | rename TopSpeed as \"Top Speed\", AvgSpeed as \"Avg Speed\"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker length |eval length=length/1609.34, duration = duration/1000/60, trip_formatted=strftime(_time, \"%m-%2d-%Y\") | stats sum(length) as Distance, sum(duration) as Duration by trip_formatted","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker length trip=\"$trip_name$\" |eval length=length/1609.34 | table length","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker trip=\"$trip_name$\" length | eval duration = duration/1000/60 | stats sum(duration)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_10":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker s>0 trip=\"$trip_name$\" |eval s=s*2.23694 |stats avg(s)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_11":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker s>0 trip=\"$trip_name$\" |eval s=s*2.23694 |stats max(s)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_12":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker trip=\"$trip_name$\" s>0 | eval s=s*2.23694 | timechart max(s) span=20s","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_13":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=geotracker trip=\"$trip_name$\" | eval ele=ele*3.28084 | timechart max(ele) span=20s","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Trip","options":{"token":"trip_name"},"encoding":{"value":"primary.trip","label":"primary.trip"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":780,"backgroundColor":"transparent","backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://623d79c6d7322a672e15fff1"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":0,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":0,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_4","type":"block","position":{"x":900,"y":0,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":140,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":140,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_single_5","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":390,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_6","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":390,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_7","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":390,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_8","type":"block","position":{"x":900,"y":390,"w":300,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":530,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":530,"w":600,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Trip Tracker"}
